caption.p: Novel transmission clusters ( A, B, C and D) identified from the transmission tree in Figure 3. Each node represents a sampled patient from the SAC database, and each arrow a directed transmission relationship. Coloured nodes represent sampled patients and indicate the corresponding coloured boxes in Figure 3. White nodes represent predicted unsampled patients. Solid arrows represent transmission relationships already known to the SAC, whereas dashed arrows represent novel inferences of transmission.
